data.title: Please let others sit comfortably
data.meta_description: Poster, 'Please let others sit comfortably', part of Seibu Railway 'Manner Poster'  series, offset printed on paper, created by Yokoyama Yumiko (art director) and Kadowaki  Takahiro (illustrator) for Dentsu Inc. under commission from The Seibu Railway Co., Ltd, Japan, September 2016
data.meta_site_name: Victoria and Albert Museum: Explore the Collections
data.text:
Brief description

Poster, 'Please let others sit comfortably', part of Seibu Railway 'Manner Poster' series, offset printed on paper, created by Yokoyama Yumiko (art director) and Kadowaki Takahiro (illustrator) for Dentsu Inc. under commission from The Seibu Railway Co., Ltd, Japan, September 2016
